alert.note: Alert for Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 5:32PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Marengo and southeastern Sumter Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 532 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Butler, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Demopolis, Linden, Jefferson, Myrtlewood, Faunsdale, Dayton, Freddie Jones Field, Pin Hook, Nanafalia, Coatopa, Dug Hill, Chickasaw State Park, Half Acre, U.S. 80 and AL 28, Old Spring Hill, Belmont, Demopolis Lock And Dam, McDowell, Calvary and Demopolis Municipal Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama.
